translations: 讨价还价，易物；敷衍，玩弄；（不必要的）争论
（尤指兽皮）十个，十张；小生意，贸易；讨价还价

sentences.sentence: He would rather die than dicker over prices.
sentences.translation: 他宁愿死也不愿意讨价还价。

sentences.sentence: I did not go to work into the enterprise now, do bit of dicker.
sentences.translation: 我现在没有进企业上班，做点小生意。

sentences.sentence: The price is lower than our cheapest price and I can 't accept your dicker any more .
sentences.translation: 你是一位真正的谈判高手，但你如果坚持这样的报价的话我们是不可能接受的。
